folder: Pennsylvania Avenue & Riverdale Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Pennsylvania Avenue, east side, from Riverdale to Livonia Avenues, showing the athletic field of Thomas Jefferson High School. The field is bounded by Pennsylvania (left, building theron), New Jersey (right), Riverdale and Livonia Avenues. The latter is in the background wher the "El" station is. Near the gas tank is Public School No. 182.
Board of Education of the City of New York
Early 1930's
